rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light and views of the garden. Scandinavian design elements include minimalistic fixtures and wood finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open living space featuring a central seating area with comfortable modern furniture. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide panoramic views. Scandinavian lighting and color palette enhance the ambiance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen design with open shelving, sleek cabinetry, and energy-efficient appliances. The layout promotes connectivity with the living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light. Vastu-aligned placement of essential elements for good energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom designed with a Scandinavian minimalist approach and comfortable seating area.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater space featuring soundproof walls and integrated audiovisual systems. Vastu principles ensure that the room is positioned for optimal acoustics and minimal disturbance.

openings.features: Large glass doors with floor-to-ceiling windows that align with Vastu guidelines ensuring auspicious entry.
A wide opening connecting the living area to a spacious garden, enhancing natural ventilation and a connection to nature.
